videoSnippet.title: Deadly as Ever || Anand vs Mamedyarov || Gashimov Memorial (2019)
videoSnippet.description:
Navara vs Carlsen here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LziBrwIEhas&feature=youtu.be

WATCH GRENKE TRAILER HERE https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=27ec5obgwqg

Follow me on Instagram for extra content https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Viswanathan Anand vs Shakhriyar Mamedyarov
6th Gashimov Memorial (2019), Shamkir AZE, rd 3, Apr-02 
Giuoco Piano (C50)

1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Bc5 4. O-O Nf6 5. d3 d6 6. c3 a6 7. a4 Ba7 8. Na3 Ne7 9. Nc2 Ng6 10. Be3 Be3 11. Ne3 O-O 12. Qc2 c6 13. a5 d5 14. Bb3 Be6 15. ed5 cd5 16. d4 e4 17. Ne5 Qd6 18. f4 ef3 19. Nf3 Rae8 20. Rfe1 Bd7 21. g3 h6 22. Qg2 Re7 23. Nc2 Rfe8 24. Nb4 Bb5 25. Re7 Re7 26. Bd1 h5 27. Qh3 Bd7 28. Qg2 Bb5 29. Qh3 h4 30. Bc2 hg3 31. Qg3 Nf4 32. Kh1 Re3 33. Rg1 g6 34. Qf2 Re2 35. Qh4 Ne4 36. Be4 de4 37. Ne5 Nd3 38. Qh8 Kh8 39. Nf7 Kh7 40. Nd6 Bd7 41. Ne4 Bf5 42. Ng5 Kh6 43. Nd3 Bd3 44. Rg3 Re1 45. Kg2 Re2 46. Kg1 Re1 47. Kf2 Re2 48. Kf3 Rb2 49. Kf4 Bf5 50. Ke5 Rh2 51. Nf7 Kg7 52. Nd6 Re2 53. Kd5 Kf6 54. c4 Re7 55. Rf3 Rd7 56. c5 Re7 57. Rf2 Rh7 58. Nf5 gf5 59. Kd6 Rh8 60. Rd2 f4 61. Kc7 Rh7 62. Kc8 f3 63. d5

Shamkir Chess 2019 is a 10-player single round-robin held in memory of Vugar Gashimov. The 6th edition of the tournament in Shamkir, Azerbaijan runs from 30 March to 9 April 2019 and features World Champion Magnus Carlsen. The total prize fund is €100,000, with €30,000 for first place.

Players receive 120 minutes for the first 40 moves, 60 minutes for the next 20 moves and then 15 minutes for the rest of the game, with a 30 seconds per move increment starting from move 61. A rapid playoff will take place in case of a tie for first place. Official website: shamkirchess.com

To those of you who read the description: You are an excellent subscriber! :)
